name: Forklift Certified
description:
You play a forklift driver in an arcade-style survival game as you work to obtain your forklift certification. In the arena, dice are fired, and based on the results, enemies appear.

Controls:
-WASD for movement
-Shift to Dash
-LMB for Fork Slam Attack

Made in 50 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Team:
> oHoodie - Programming
> xBrowi - Programming
> Red - 2D art
> Seth "Forky7 " Hartman - Music and Sound Design
> S.A.M .- Music
> Flynn - 3D art
> Fracture - 3D art
